### Q1A Create generate_partial_clique() function. 

Create a function generate_partial_clique() inside your UWBiost561 package inside a file called generate_partial_clique.R inside your R folder. 

```{r}
library(UWBiost561)
set.seed(0)
simulation <- UWBiost561::generate_partial_clique(
  n = 10,
  clique_fraction = 0.5,
  clique_edge_density = 0.9
)

simulation$adj_mat
```
